text: Zara khayal karo us waqt ka jabke shaytan ne in logon ke kartoot inki nigahon mein khushnuma bana kar dikhaye thay aur insey kaha tha ke aaj koi tumpar gaalib nahin aa sakta, aur yeh ke main tumhare saath hoon. Magar jab dono girohon ka aamna saamna hua to woh ultey paaon phir gaya aur kehne laga ke mera tumhara saath nahin hai, main woh kuch dekh raha hoon jo tumlog nahin dekhte. Mujhey khuda se darr lagta hai aur khuda badi sakht saza dene wala hai
